id: [Default] Access Request For Identity With Multiple Accounts Failed
name: Access Request For Identity With Multiple Accounts Failed
description: Sent to the requester if their access request failed because the user they requested access for has multiple accounts on the source.
subject: Request for '${requestItemName}' Failed
body:
Dear ${recipientName},

Your request for '${requestItemName}' failed because you have more than one account on the '${sourceName}' source.

Please contact your administrator for assistance.

Thanks,
The ${PRODUCT_NAME} Team
